name: invite
example_en: She decided to invite all her friends to her birthday party.
example_cn: 她决定邀请她所有的朋友来参加她的生日派对。
word_family: invitation (n. 邀请), inviting (adj. 诱人的), invited (adj. 被邀请的)
memory_tips: 词根 'in-' 表示 '进入'，'vite' 来自拉丁语 'vocare'，意为 '召唤'。联想记忆：想象你正在进入一个派对，因为有人召唤（邀请）你。图像记忆：想象一张精美的邀请卡，上面写着你的名字。

image_prompt.main_image: A beautifully designed invitation card with golden borders, lying on a wooden table with a pen next to it, ready to be written.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of friends laughing and enjoying a birthday party, with a birthday cake in the center of the table, balloons in the background.

collocations: invite trouble (自找麻烦); invite over (邀请来做客); wedding invite (婚礼请柬)
